title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Improving Effectiveness of E-Learning Content Design Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language skills and fundamental proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the relationship between e-learning content design and blended learning strategies
Learners achieve over 80% effectiveness in language learning content through formative assessment
Learners perform self-directed learning at least three times per week using strategies in an LMS environment
Learners propose at least three improvements for learning experiences based on motivation and satisfaction surveys
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
